p: Based on the results of the mitochondrial sequence analyses, populations from specific years between 1989 and 2011 ( Table 1) were selected and analyzed by means of microsatellite genotyping of six microsatellite loci according to Hadrys et al. [ 20]. Automated genotyping were carried out using the 500 ROX ™ Size Standard (Applied Biosystems, GeneScan ™) on an ABI PRISM ® 310 Genetic Analyzer (Applied Biosystems). For the allele size determination the GeneScan ® Analysis Software (Applied Biosystems) was used.
